Headline: #18 16th-18th, #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary West Reroute near Ogden/Campbell
ShortDescription: Westbound 18 16th-18th, 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily near Ogden/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound 18 16th-18th, 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily near Ogden/Campbell.

Buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, California and Ogden including the normal route streets, due to street blockage near Ogden & Campbell.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at Michigan/121st
ShortDescription: #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 119th, State, 127th, and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/121st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 119th, State, 127th, and Michigan,  then resume their regular route, due to street blockage near Michigan/121st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Homan/Douglas
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted near Homan/Douglas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglas,  and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Homan/Douglas.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at  Clark/Addison.
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
